# Configuration file for Himmeli v3.
# A tutorial is available on the Himmeli web site.

GraphName	demoGraph
EdgeFile	edges.txt	
#VertexFile	vertices.txt
EdgeHeadVariable	HEAD	
EdgeTailVariable	TAIL	
EdgeWeightVariable	WEIGHT
#VertexNameVariable	NAME
#VertexShapeVariable	SHAPE
ArrowMode	on
DecorationMode	on
DistanceUnit	0.9
